attributes.action: limit the salaries of many charity employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of the jobs advertised in our local paper seem to be highly paid charitity jobs usually in marketing or PR. They often offer pay which is much higher than other companies in the area. Charities should not be spending £50000 on a wage for a marketing executive, they should be spending it on the cause that they are supposed to be helping.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
